metadata.title: SciFish Steller Watch
metadata.description: The Stellar Watch system is a time-lapse photography system for remote Steller sea lion sites.  The remote image data collection system was devised to observe Stellar sea lions and determine predation of other mammals, juvenile and pop survival rates, and population counts.  The system uses time lapse photography from remote solar powered cameras to gather data.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide comprehensive imagery data from remote locations for analyzing Stellar sea lion behavior and a rich data set for scientific analyses.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Contact Source.

Use constraints: Check with Source.
